title: Best Chance
description: Book 6 of the More Than Friends Gay Romance Series Each book may be read as a stand-alone. Reading in sequence is not required.  More Than Friends #1 (Free) More Than Friends #2: Drunk in Love More Than Friends #3: Choosing Happy More Than Friends #4: Just Stay More Than Friends #5: Hands On More Than Friends #6: Best Chance  Vinnie is happy as a bartender at Ray's and not looking for anything serious to complicate things. He has great friends and a simple life. When Chance comes into his bar, he brings more than just the possibility of a fun fling.  Vinnie isn't sure he's ready to commit, especially when there is a toddler in the mix.
author: Aria Grace
